about.title: Hello! I'm Ivan Paniagua Sanchez
about.description: A passionate software developer with training in Web Application Development (DAW) and Multiplatform Application Development (DAM).
details: I love programming and I'm always looking to learn new technologies to improve my skills. During my training, I have worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, PHP, Java, Python, and databases such as MySQL. My goal is to create efficient and well-structured solutions, whether in web development or mobile and desktop applications.
I am a curious, self-taught person eager to take on new challenges in the technology world. If you want to learn more about me or work together on a project, don't hesitate to contact me! ðŸš€

projects.title: FullStackOpen
projects.description: This project is a full-stack course where React and Node.js are used. The course goes deep into these frameworks while also covering JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It also includes a certification upon completion.

projects.title: Anubis Gaming
projects.description: This project is a video game sales website developed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. It includes a chatbot named THOT to help users find games, a gambling minigame called MEHEN, a user authentication system, and a store with a shopping cart and redeemable coin system. It was implemented using technologies like Node.js, Express, and AJAX for an interactive and personalized experience.

projects.title: Anubis Gaming 2.0
projects.description: This project will be an improved version of the Anubis Gaming project, applying knowledge of the React framework and Node.js with Express as the backend server.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: This project is a classic Tic-Tac-Toe game developed with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, without any frameworks or additional libraries. It is a two-player game where players take turns marking 'X' and 'O' on a 3x3 grid.

experience.title: Higher Technical Degree in Multiplatform Application Development
experience.institution: I.E.S Gaspar Melchor de Jovellanos - Fuenlabrada
experience.description: Training in multiplatform application development. Focus on creating apps for different platforms like Android and more.

experience.title: Higher Technical Degree in Web Application Development
experience.description: Training in web application development, with a focus on technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and databases.

experience.title: Baccalaureate in Science
experience.description: Training in science, with subjects like mathematics, physics, and chemistry.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can reach me through my social media or by sending me an email.
